fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Consumers, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: we are committed to spread scientific knowledge within the European countries in order to collaborate with them sharing scientific discoveries supporting each other. As a matter of fact we sensitize all the MEPs who deals about research, health and industry issues
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
IRBM is committed to accelerating discovery and preclinical 
development of disease modifying small molecule and peptidic drug candidates. Therapeutic areas of expertise include neurodegeneration, oncology, viral and parasitic diseases.
